title: Is modern technology making life better? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes! Ofcouse, The technology we use are making our life easier and definitely better. Friends, I have always been a person believing in science and technology and that is why my answer is sided with technology. Modern Technology has helped us in saving the two most important thing in human life Time and Energy and this started from the time of steam engines. People started to transfer goods on engines saving time and energy, Moreover we have achieved industrial revolution, the most important step in making our life better. Mobile phones, laptops have helped us in reaching anywhere we want at the click of our hand. Now we can talk to anyone, anywhere in this world instantly. There are many other hundreds and thousands of reasons in the support of my answer but the more I write the more the list goes on. Cheers and, Enjoy the benefits of modern technology.

Nowadays, modern technologies have become indispensable parts in many sectors from communication to transportation to food processing. Some people argue that the advent of advanced technologies makes life more complicated and people busier. From my own point of view, most of those technologies have positive impact on society. I think, new technologies have helped people achieve many things which were previously formidable or even impossible. For example, since modern solar panels, which efficiently absorb sunlight and convert it into electricity, were introduced, the price of solar energy has been reduced significantly, encouraging more people to use this renewable source of energy. Moreover, nowadays, people usually spend less time on doing housework, travelling and writing thanks to the introduction of washing machines, motor vehicles and computers, respectively. The extra free time can be used for beneficial activities like hanging out with friends and indulging in physical exercises.
